MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CH4 postcode area of Chester, affecting properties in Wrexham Road, Vincent Drive and surrounding streets. Our engineers are currently onsite carrying out investigations into the cause of your power loss. We now expect to have your power restored by 11am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 08:05am on the 28th April 2021.
